mapper.select: SELECT id AS id , name AS name , contact_number AS contactNumber , main_category AS mainCategory , sub_category AS subCategory , floor AS floor , description AS description , avg_score AS avgScore , review_count AS reviewCount FROM store WHERE id = #{storeId}

SELECT review.id , review.member_id , member.nickname , member.img_url , review.store_id , review.is_deleted , review.created_at , review.updated_at , review.score , review.content FROM review, member WHERE store_id = #{storeId} AND review.member_id = member.id ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT hashtag.id AS id , hashtag.name AS name , hashtag.category AS category FROM hashtag INNER JOIN store_hashtag ON hashtag.id = store_hashtag.hashtag_id WHERE store_hashtag.store_id = #{storeId} ORDER BY store_hashtag.count DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT store.id AS id , store.name AS name , store.contact_number AS contactNumber , store.main_category AS mainCategory , store.sub_category AS subCategory , store.floor AS floor , store.description AS description , store.avg_score AS avgScore , store.review_count AS reviewCount FROM store INNER JOIN store_hashtag ON store.id = store_hashtag.store_id WHERE store_hashtag.hashtag_id = #{hashtagId} ORDER BY store_hashtag.count DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT image.id AS id , review.id AS reviewId , review.member_id AS memberId , review.store_id AS storeId , image.img_url AS imgUrl FROM review, image WHERE review.id = image.review_id AND review.id = #{reviewId}
